programme.title: Raymond Mander & Joe Mitchenson
programme.short_synopsis: Roy Plomley's castaways are theatre historians Raymond Mander & Joe Mitchenson
programme.medium_synopsis: Roy Plomley's castaways are theatre historians Raymond Mander & Joe Mitchenson.
programme.long_synopsis:
Roy Plomley's castaways are theatre historians Raymond Mander & Joe Mitchenson.

Favourite track: The Ride Of The Valkyries by Richard Wagner
Book: Photo albums and A set of Who's Who in the Theatre
Luxury: Couch and coconut oil and an ultra-sensitive receiver to hear voices from the past

programme.title: Desert Island Discs
programme.short_synopsis: Kirsty Young invites her castaway guests to share the soundtrack of their lives.
